enWisdom: Generosity is the protector of honour
Nobleness is preferring dignity over wealth
Nothing safeguards reputations like spending generously
Protect your reputations by spending your wealth generously

Wisdom: وُفُورُ الدِّينِ وَالْعِرْضِ بِابْتِذَالِ الْأَمْوَالِ [الْمَالِ‏] مَوْهِبَةٌ سَنِيَّةٌ
enWisdom: Plenitude of religion and dignity [that is acquired] through generously spending wealth is a sublime gift

Wisdom: وَقِّ [وَفِّرْ] عِرْضَكَ بِعَرَضِكَ تُكْرَمْ وَتَفَضَّلْ تُخْدَمْ وَاحْلُمْ تُقَدَّمْ
enWisdom: Protect your dignity with your worldly possessions and you will be honoured, do good to others and you will be served, show clemency and you will be put forward (or you will advance)

Wisdom: وُفُورُ الْعِرْضِ بِابْتِذَالِ الْمَالِ وَصَلَاحُ الدِّينِ بِإِفْسَادِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: The plenitude of dignity is [attained] through the generous spending of wealth, and the uprightness of religion is [realized] through devaluing this world
